body.p: Our web pages remain one of the best sources of information, and are also mirrored at many sites around the world. Try connecting to www.FreeBSD.org/yourcountry (e.g., www.FreeBSD.org/de/ for Germany or select a mirror from the drop-down list on the front page.
The FreeBSD web pages are translated into several languages. Links to the translated versions of these web pages can be found on the front page.
For information on recent FreeBSD progress and releases, see the Newsflash page.
